taskDescription:
Machine translation may be a shortcut to languages you do not know (yet). Try it out for unknown languages!

 

 

  1. Register at Lyricstranslate.com 
  2. In “To language”, select your native language.
  3. From the list of results, choose a song in any language (even languages you don’t know) and copy the lyrics in the box below.
  4. You can use machine translation to translate the selected song into English AND into your native language. Paste the machine translations in the box below. The English may help you to understand it better.
  5. Post-edit (review) the machine translation to make it more accurate and nice.
  6. Post the translation ONLY if you are proud of the result!

[This essay does not score points]
